Animated Armor.name: Slam
Animated Armor.text: The animated armor raises a greatsword above its helmet and slams it down upon your head!

Brass Dragon Wyrmling.name: Fire Breath
Brass Dragon Wyrmling.text: The wyrmling rears back and releases a giant ball of flame around you!

Brown Bear.name: Bite
Brown Bear.text: The brown bear lunges forward and bites into your neck!

Bugbear.name: Morningstar
Bugbear.text: The Bugbear sucker punches your face with the business end of a mace!

Death Dog.name: Double Bite
Death Dog.text: The only thing worse than rabies is rabies twice.

Dire Wolf.name: Rend
Dire Wolf.text: The Dire Wolf captures your arm and viciously rips away at it's flesh!

Dryad.name: Entangle
Dryad.text: A brush turns into a choking thistle wrapping around your neck!

Duergar.name: War Pick
Duergar.text: The Duergar slams a war pick deep into your shoulder, attempting to unsheath the gold beneath!

Ghoul.name: Claws
Ghoul.text: The Ghoul digs razor sharp claws deep into your ribs, blood drips down from your breastplate!

Giant Eagle.name: Swoop
Giant Eagle.text: A Giant Eagle dives at you from the cliffs and sweeps you with razor talons!

Giant Hyena.name: Pack Assault
Giant Hyena.text: A pack of Hyenas lead by the Giant Hyena descends upon you from the brushes, gnawing and clawing at your flesh!

Giant Spider.name: Venomous Sting
Giant Spider.text: The Giant Spider grapples you, instantly sinking in a pair of venomous fangs!

Giant Toad.name: Body Slam
Giant Toad.text: With a massive leap, the Giant Toad slams down on top of you!

Giant Vulture.name: Beaktear
Giant Vulture.text: You feel a powerful wing smash across your back as a razor beak slashes at your neck!

Harpy.name: Wing Whip
Harpy.text: Like a streak of lightning the Harpy swoops down and slashes you with a razor sharp wing talon

Hippogriff.name: Aerial Plunge
Hippogriff.text: The Hippogriff grapples you and takes flight, crushing your body from a hundred meter fall!

Imp.name: Hellbolt
Imp.text: The Imp summons a fiery bolt and throws it, striking you deftly in the shoulder!

Quasit.name: Wretched Bite
Quasit.text: The Quasit sneaks into your armor, tearing bits of flesh as it travels!

Spectre.name: Ethereal Drift
Spectre.text: The Spectre points a bony finger at you as wisps arise and pull at your soul!
